footer_subscribeDesc: Sign up with your email address to receive news and updates.
about_bg_p1: I am a Licensed Psychotherapist and Registered Member of the International Council of Psychotherapists in the UK.
about_bg_p2: My family and I have been travelling around the world since I was a child and I've had the amazing opportunity to experience different cultures and countries. Seeing how people from all walks of life live, think and feel has been an eye-opening experience for me and it's been a major factor in why I chose to pursue a career as a psychotherapist.
about_bg_p3: I am passionate about creating a welcoming environment for clients where they can freely express themselves without judgement or fear. Having experienced so many different cultures has made me more understanding and accepting of others, which is something I always strive to bring into my practice.
about_bg_p4: If you're looking for someone to talk to, please don't hesitate to reach out. I'm here for everyone who needs someone to listen.
about_philosophy_p1: Embarking on a journey of self-healing is like opening the door to a world of boundless potential. It's an incredibly brave and empowering decision to make, one that offers you the chance to grow in ways you may never have imagined.
about_philosophy_p2: When embarking on this journey, it's important to be guided and supported by someone who understands and respects your unique needs.
about_philosophy_p3: In my practice, I strive to provide a safe, non-judgmental space for you to explore and discover more about yourself. Through our work together, I hope to help you build trust in yourself and your capabilities, as we uncover the building blocks for your healing journey.
about_philosophy_p4: I do not believe in having a one-size-fits-all approach – rather, I will work together with you to create a personalized plan, based on your unique goals, personality, and strengths. I will equip you with the necessary tools to build a ‘unique toolbox’, one filled with skills and resources that you can turn to whenever you need.
about_philosophy_p5: Take a deep breath and trust that I am here to help you on this journey of self-healing – I am committed to supporting and empowering you every step of the way.
about_quote_text: I believe that everyone is trying their best to become the best version of themselves. I’m on a fulfilling journey of holding their hand if they allow me.
services_testimonials_desc: Hear from others who have worked with me on their journey toward healing and growth.
services_header_title: Get treatment for all your mental healthcare needs.
services_boxes_desc1: I'm here as your trusted ally in psychotherapy, offering you the support and insight you need to become more conscious of who you are and achieve your goals.
services_boxes_desc2: I offer individual therapy, counseling, coaching and more, designed to give you the tools you need to master your own powerful transformation and build a healthier, happier life that awaits you.
services_boxes_desc3: Join me as we open the door to transformation, growth, and long-term wellness, all while on the path to long-term healing.
services_boxes_individual_desc: One-on-one sessions focused on your specific needs and goals. Together, we'll work through challenges such as anxiety, depression, stress, relationship issues, or major life transitions.
services_boxes_individual_feature2: Available in-person or via secure video call
services_boxes_specialized_desc: Focused therapeutic approaches for specific challenges you may be facing, including expat adjustment, cultural transition, and identity exploration.
services_boxes_specialized_feature1: Expat adjustment and cultural transition support
Remotely_description: My office is conveniently located in Singapore. Can’t make it into the office? No worries – I’ve got you covered with teletherapy. You'll get the same high-quality care and personal attention, right from the comfort of your own home.
JoinYou_title: I look forward to joining you on your path toward emotional well-being and mental clarity
Testimonials_title: Clients that have pursued therapy know they are in good hands with me. Here is what some of them have to say:
Testimonials_subtitle: Hear from others who have worked with me on their journey toward healing and growth.
article_description: Here you will find advice and resources to help you make positive changes in your life. Whether you're struggling with anxiety, depression, or any other mental health issue, I'm here to provide you with the tools and insight needed to overcome any obstacle that life throws your way. With my experience in psychology and counselling, I'm ready to help you work towards a healthier, happier you. If you have any questions feel free to reach out – I'm always happy to help because you matter.
contact_subtitle: You can send your message here and I'll get back to you.

Feeling overwhelmed: Feeling overwhelmed, stuck, or held back by anxiety, depression, or other struggles? With extensive personal and international experience, I'm here to help you navigate life's challenges, no matter your background or how deep-rooted your issues may be. Don't wait..let's chat and move forward, together.
credentialsDescription: Certified and licensed by leading therapeutic associations, ensuring you receive the highest standard of care.
licensedMemberDescription: Licensed member of the Association of Psychotherapists and Counsellors in Singapore
certifiedMemberDescription: Certified member of the Association of Integrative Psychotherapists in the UK
empatheticTherapist: Your Empathetic and Globally Minded Therapist
sallyIntroduction: I'm Sally, a mother of two wonderful adult daughters and someone who has embraced the 'trailing spouse' experience across numerous countries. This incredible journey has immersed me in diverse cultures, rich history, vibrant arts, and delicious food on nearly every continent.
sallyExperience: My international experience has given me a unique perspective on human challenges and resilience, allowing me to connect with clients from all walks of life with genuine understanding and empathy.
compassionateDescription: I believe in honest feedback and a collaborative approach to your healing journey.
internationalDescription: Having worked with clients across cultures, I bring a global perspective to our sessions.
holisticDescription: I consider all aspects of your life—mental, emotional, physical, and social—in our work together.
resultsDescription: If you're not seeing progress, I want to know, and we'll adjust our approach accordingly.
servicesDescription: Tailored therapeutic support to help you navigate life's challenges and discover your path to well-being.
specializedTherapyTitle: Specialized Holistic Therapy for Lasting Mental Well-being
specializedTherapyDescription1: I specialise in addressing various mental health challenges with a scientifically grounded holistic approach. My training is continuously updated with the latest advancements in neuroscience and psychology, allowing me to offer therapy that targets the core issues that may have kept you feeling stuck.
specializedTherapyDescription2: I understand that many people seek therapy to see tangible progress and lasting change. While ongoing support can benefit some, my focus is on empowering you to achieve meaningful results and build a fulfilling life as efficiently as possible. Let's begin that journey today.
specializedTherapyDescription3: I offer a complimentary 15-minute consultation to discuss your needs and how my approach can help you become the best version of yourself. Please email me to schedule your free consultation. For clients who may benefit from medication, I collaborate with trusted psychiatrists to ensure comprehensive care. While I believe in exploring therapeutic avenues first, I recognise the value of medication when necessary and work as part of your wider support team.
flexibleTherapyTitle: To make therapy as accessible and comfortable as possible, I offer flexible options to suit your needs.
flexibleTherapyDescription1: Embrace the convenience and privacy of online sessions from the comfort of your home. Alternatively, for those who find movement and the outdoors beneficial, consider walk-and-talk therapy sessions in a park setting. This approach, which gained significant popularity during the pandemic and continues to help many, harnesses the powerful connection between movement, nature, and psychological well-being.
flexibleTherapyBenefit1: Walking side-by-side can create a less confrontational and more relaxed atmosphere, potentially making it easier to discuss complex or sensitive topics.
flexibleTherapyBenefit2: The gentle physical activity can also reduce anxiety and stress, release endorphins that boost mood, and enhance cognitive function and creative thinking.
flexibleTherapyDescription2: By engaging your body, you may find it easier to process emotions, gain new perspectives, and feel a sense of forward momentum, both literally and figuratively, on your healing journey.
flexibleTherapyCallToAction: Why not give it a try and experience these unique benefits firsthand?
firstStepTitle: Let's Take That First Step Together
firstStepDescription: It's never too late to prioritize your well-being. Whether you're feeling stuck, overwhelmed, or simply seeking growth, I'm here to support you on your journey.
clientExperiencesDescription: Hear from others who have worked with me on their journey toward healing and growth.
